entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.IFRS.0101.9535] The concept ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInDepositsFromBanks appears in the investing cash flows of the company's cash flow statement. ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInDepositsFromBanks is an operating item and it is expected that this item would only appear in the cash flow generated from operating activities. Please review the calculations defined for the cash flow statement to determine that the correct element has been used for this item.
Rule Element Id:9535 Rule version: 14.0.0RC1 -
